languages.text: {n}Фроше почтительно кивает, и на пожилом лице с выдающимися звериными брылями возникает нечто среднее между выражением бесконечной преданности, материнской заботой и религиозным обожанием.{/n}
{n}Froscher nods deferentially, and on his aged, jowled face appears an expression caught between eternal loyalty, motherly affection, and religious devotion.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Фроше почтительно кивает, и на пожилом лице с выдающимися звериными брылями возникает нечто среднее между выражением бесконечной преданности, материнской заботой и религиозным обожанием.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Froscher nods deferentially, and on his aged, jowled face appears an expression caught between eternal loyalty, motherly affection, and religious devotion.{/n}

{n}Froscher nods deferentially, and on his aged, jowled face appears an expression caught between eternal loyalty, motherly affection, and religious devotion.{/n}

languages.text: {n}弗罗舍谦恭地点点头。他那张满是皱纹的脸庞上，浮现出了介于忠诚、母爱与虔信三者之间的表情。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Froscher nods deferentially, and on his aged, jowled face appears an expression caught between eternal loyalty, motherly affection, and religious devotion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}弗罗舍谦恭地点点头。他那张满是皱纹的脸庞上，浮现出了介于忠诚、母爱与虔信三者之间的表情。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Froscher asiente con deferencia y la expresión de su anciano rostro está a medio camino entre la lealtad eterna, el afecto maternal y la devoción religiosa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Froscher nods deferentially, and on his aged, jowled face appears an expression caught between eternal loyalty, motherly affection, and religious devotion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Froscher asiente con deferencia y la expresión de su anciano rostro está a medio camino entre la lealtad eterna, el afecto maternal y la devoción religiosa.{/n}

languages.text: {n}フロッシャーが恭しくうなずく。年老いて丸みを帯びた顔の輪郭に、永遠の忠誠と母親のような愛情、そして信仰心の間で揺れ動く表情が表れる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Froscher nods deferentially, and on his aged, jowled face appears an expression caught between eternal loyalty, motherly affection, and religious devotion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}フロッシャーが恭しくうなずく。年老いて丸みを帯びた顔の輪郭に、永遠の忠誠と母親のような愛情、そして信仰心の間で揺れ動く表情が表れる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Froscher acquiesce avec respect. Son visage âgé et tombant affiche un air mêlant loyauté éternelle, affection maternelle et dévotion religieuse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Froscher nods deferentially, and on his aged, jowled face appears an expression caught between eternal loyalty, motherly affection, and religious devotion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Froscher acquiesce avec respect. Son visage âgé et tombant affiche un air mêlant loyauté éternelle, affection maternelle et dévotion religieuse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Froscher nickt respektvoll, und der Ausdruck auf seinem alten Gesicht ist eine Mischung aus ewiger Loyalität, mütterlicher Zuneigung und religiöser Hingabe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Froscher nods deferentially, and on his aged, jowled face appears an expression caught between eternal loyalty, motherly affection, and religious devotion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Froscher nickt respektvoll, und der Ausdruck auf seinem alten Gesicht ist eine Mischung aus ewiger Loyalität, mütterlicher Zuneigung und religiöser Hingabe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Froscher, saygıyla baş sallıyor. İhtiyarlamış, sarkık suratında ebedî sadakat, anne şefkati ve dinî bağlılık arasında kalmış bir ifade beliriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Froscher nods deferentially, and on his aged, jowled face appears an expression caught between eternal loyalty, motherly affection, and religious devotion.{/n}
